title: Mix it up
text: You are unable to make ranged attacks for the next 1d6 rounds.

title: Aim carefully next time
text: For 3 rounds, you must spend a full round action to make a single attack.

title: Don't hit me!
text: For 3 rounds, you take an additional -2 penalty on ranged attacks for each ally in melee combat with your target.

title: Phantom wind
text: You compensate for a breeze which isn't there. You take -2 penalty on ranged attack rolls for 3 rounds.

title: Recoil
text: You move backward 1 square and fall %STATUS-PRONE=prone%.

title: Amazing miss
text: You are %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1 round (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Fort negates%).

title: Not my pony
text: Your attack hits the nearest allied animal or mount.

title: Double miss
text: You use twice as much ammunition on this attack.

title: Close to the ear
text: You are %STATUS-DEAFENED=deafened% %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed% (DC 15 Heal Check).

title: Insecure
text: You take a -1 penalty on attack rolls for 1d4 rounds or until you score a critical hit.

title: In the line of fire
text: Your attack hits the nearest ally and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.

title: Lowered guard
text: You provoke attacks of opportunity from all threatening foes.

title: Weapon jam
text: If using a projectile weapon, it does not function. Spend 1 standard action to clear.

title: Um, oops
text: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.

title: What are the odds?
text: If you made a thrown attack, you hit the target, but the weapon ends up in the target's possession.

title: Lost grip
text: You can only take a move action next round.

title: Pinch in parts
text: You take 1d6 points of damage.

title: So much blood
text: You are %STATUS-SICKENED=sickened% for 1d6 rounds.

title: Huh?
text: You are %STATUS-CONFUSED=confused% for 1 round.

title: Seeing double
text: All your attacks have a 50% miss chance for 1 round.

title: Misjudged the distance
text: All attack rolls beyond the first ranged increment have triple the normal distance penalty for 3 rounds.

title: Overcompensate
text: All targets with cover gain an additional +4 bonus to AC against you for 3 rounds.

title: Friendly fire
text: Your attack hits your ally closest to the target.

title: Lost the target
text: You take a -4 penalty on all attack rolls for 1 round.

title: Shot your foot
text: You take 1d2 points of %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage% and your speed is reduced by half %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.

title: Overthrow
text: If attack was made with a thrown weapon, the weapon travels 5 times its range increment in a random direction.

title: Tunnel vision
text: For the next 3 rounds, you have a +1 bonus on attack rolls, but you %STATUS-FLAT-FOOTED=flat-footed%.

title: All thumbs
text: You lose your %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% bonus on attack rolls for 3 rounds.

title: Bull's eye
text: Your shot ricochets and hits you near the eye. You are %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1 round.

title: Bad alignment
text: You take -4 penalty on all attacks with this weapon until repaired (DC 20 Craft check).

title: Cracked
text: Your weapon (not ammunition) takes 1d6 %OBJECT-DAMAGE=points of damage%, ignoring hardness.

title: Whoops!
text: You are knocked %STATUS-PRONE=prone%.

title: Tied up
text: You become %STATUS-ENTANGLED=entangled% in your gear until you spend a standard action to free yourself.

title: Sprain
text: You take 1d4 points of %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%.

title: Nicked
text: You take 1 point of %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%.

title: Klutz
text: You drop your weapon.

title: Spilled ammo
text: Your ammunition falls from its container and takes 1d6 rounds to gather up.

title: Head rush
text: You are %STATUS-SICKENED=sickened% for 1d4 rounds.

title: My spleeny bits!
text: You take 1 point of %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%.

title: Notched fingers
text: You take 1d6 points of %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%.

title: Torn tendon
text: You take 1 point of %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%.

title: Broken
text: Your weapon is destroyed (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Ref negates%). %OBJECT-DAMAGE=Magic weapons use their own save bonus% (Core Rulebook 538).

title: Everything you got
text: You are %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted% (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Fort negates%).

title: Snapped string
text: If attack was made with a bow or crossbow, the string breaks and requires 1d3 round to fix.

title: Wrong weapon
text: If you made a thrown attack, you throw a random object from your gear.

title: Archer's elbow
text: You take a -2 penalty on all ranged attack rolls for 1d4 minutes.

title: Wide open
text: You are %STATUS-FLAT-FOOTED=flat-footed% for 1 round.

title: Backfire
text: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.

title: Errant aim
text: Reroll attack against creature nearest the target (yourself excluded).

title: You'll shoot your eye out
text: The attack hits you and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.

title: Arching back
text: You are %STATUS-FATIGUED=fatigued%.

title: Awkward attack
text: You take -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds.
